pages.text: $(li)The Sconce is a new kind of light source.$(br)$(li)Unlike the torches, this one which can't be washed away by water.$(br)$(li)The Sconce can be turned off with water and splash water bottles.

$(li)The Sconce can lit up with Fire Charges, Flaming Arrows and Flint and Steel.$(br)$(li)It exists a redstone lever variant called $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/sconce_lever)Sconce Lever$(/l)
$(li)The Soul Sconce is just a new variant of the normal Sconces.$(br)$(li)The flames of the Soul Sconce have the blue color.
$(li)The Glow Sconce is just a new variant of the normal Sconces.$(br)$(li)The flames of the Soul Sconce have the yellow color.
$(li)The Ender Sconce is just a new variant of the normal Sconces.$(br)$(li)The flames of the Soul Sconce have the purple color.
